class GeometryDebugMarker

Detailed Description

This class allows you to visually debug geometric operations.

Shapes will be drawn as additive blocks, but will read from the z-buffer, so you can see how the debug triangles intersect with world geometry.

The geometry will be cleared every frame, unless freeze is enabled. Freeze is enabled by clicking the middle mouse button. Once freeze is enabled, all geometry add / delete calls are ignored. This allows you to examine a single frame of debug geometry.
